channel.title: Get Supports on AWDP
channel.description: Recent content in Get Supports on AWDP

item.title: Get Supports
item.description: Service Introduction Our volunteer team will provide you with free support services for anti-domestic violence and other gender-based violence. Our services include legal support, emotional support, language support, shelter applications, relief fund applications, employment assistance, and comprehensive support. We provide both online and offline support. We offer offline support in Belgium, while in other countries and regions, you can choose to receive our online support services via WeChat, WhatsApp group chat, text, voice, and phone.
